1.content:
You're a teenager, and you've gotten into trouble with your mom for spending too much time on your computer and video games, and neglecting your homework and household chores. Now mom has banned you from playing any electronic games for a week. You are bored, and looking for something to fill this great void in your life.

So, to start things off, are you a boy or girl?
1.title: Bored...

choices: What seems to be a Japanese variant of Trivial Pursuits
11.content:
Your name is Terry. You're 17 and in trouble with your mom. The best option seems to be keeping out of her way, and avoiding any electronic games. It's Saturday, and set to be a very longer and boring weekend.

You are aware of a garage sale nearby, so decide to walk over to pass some time, and see if there's anything of interest there. After rummaging around for several minutes you come across a battered box, and after brushing off the dust on the top discover that it's a board game. Well, not ideal as you may need to actually engage with someone else to play it, but at least it should pass some time. So, after haggling the price down to a buck you hand over your money and walk home with your new purchase. Once you are back in your bedroom you have a better look at what you've actually bought. What game do you have?
11.title: Boy, late teens

111.content:
The illustration on the lid looks like trivial pursuits but the writing isn't in English. It looks oriental, and you guess Japanese. Bugger. That puts paid to reading the questions, if they're all in a foreign language. Then you notice drawings around the sides of the box that appear to represent people engaging in various sexual acts. Well, that's not what you had expected. It may still be worth investigating this game! You hadn't realized there was a sex related version. Mind you, it would still be fairly dependent on having pictures on the cards - your Japanese is non-existent.

You open the box, and remove all of the contents. You lay out the board on your bedroom floor. There is a card dispenser, but it seems to be locked or jammed shut. There is part of an instruction leaflet which has been torn. This seems to be in Japanese, although as you turn it over there is a small section written in English.

You read that the game is called Sexual Pursuits, and you have the deluxe change edition. The object of the game seems similar to Trivial Pursuit, but instead of answering questions you must complete assigned tasks to earn your wedges. Once a player has collected one wedge of each color they make their way toward the central hub for the conclusion of the game, with one final action to be completed. The categories are: Blue - Nice, Green - Naughty, Purple - Objects, Yellow - Clothes, Orange - The human body, and Red - Sharing.

Finally (you continue reading), most cards (indicated by red borders) are action cards - you must complete the action as defined but change cards (indicated by gold borders) will be randomly dispensed - whatever change is stated or chosen must be completed.

Well, that all seems a bit tame really. You're not sure what all the categories mean, but guess you could find out by checking over the cards. Besides nobody is actually going to check that you do everything precisely, so there will be plenty of scope to skip a category if it's really too naff. You're also not entirely sure what the change cards are for - presumably (given the title of the game) you swap an object or perhaps items of clothing with the other player, which could make the whole thing a tad more interesting, depending of course on who you play the game with!.

So your first problem is finding someone to play with.

Clearly this would need to be a girl, and preferably someone you fancy, so that you can actually enjoy the game, rather than purely working through the game imagining what you could be doing. Your first thoughts turn to Janie in your class at school - you've had the hots for her for a while. Or (reality check time) you could try playing with your little sister Bryony. She's only 10, so you hope she would't understand the majority of sexual references anyway. You definitely rule out your mom - not a good idea in view of your new understanding of the theme of the game.

You hear a noise at your bedroom door. It opens and in walks...
111.title: A Japanese variate of Trivial Pursuits

1111.content:
Your kid sister Bryony comes in. She's 10, quite slim, with a bubbly personality, and you consider her a bit naive. She's a natural redhead.
"Oi. How about knocking first!" you yell at her. She turns and knocks on the inside of the door. "Better late than never!."
OK, so her normal entry ritual, which she knows annoys you, has been completed.
"What you got there Terry?"
"Nothing for you to worry about. Just a board game."
Within three seconds Bryony has sat herself down on the floor beside the board. "Come on then. Let's play... Um, what is it?"
"Who says I'm going to play it with you?" you respond, desperately thinking how to avoid playing it with Bryony. "I was going to invite one of my friends over, so you can just go away again."
With that Bryony lies back on the floor, opens her mouth, and screams "Mom, Terry won't play with me!"
Oh bugger it. It's only a matter of seconds before the inevitable response comes up the stair from your mom telling you in no uncertain terms that you will play with your sister, or your ban will be extended. "Ok, Ok, you can play."
"So what do we do?"
"I don't know. I've barely even read the instructions. Um, roll the die to see who goes first I guess."
1111.title: Your little sister

choices: Say some nice about the other player
11111.content:
Bryony rolls 6, but you roll a mere 4, so allowing her to start first. She picks up the die again and rolls again, this time rolling a 3. She picks up the pink playing piece, and walks it three spaces down of the spokes towards the edge of the board, ending on a blank space. So now it’s your turn. You roll a 4. You move the blue playing piece along 4 spaces onto a blue space. You know you must take a card from the little dispenser, although are a bit confused why there’s only a single dispenser – surely you need six sets of question cards – one for each category?

You reach forward to press the button on the dispenser Bryony sees what you’re doing, jumps forward and whacks her hand onto the button before you reach it. However, nothing happens. “Why won’t it work?” Bryony exclaims. “It’s broken!” Oh great. No wonder the game was in the garage sale – the only functional part of the entire game won’t work. You reach forward to see if you can fix it, but as soon as your hand is over the button you hear a gentle clunk, and a card emerges from the slot near the bottom of the dispenser.

“Well that’s weird.” you mutter. Either it just took a long time to respond to Bryony hitting it, or it somehow detected the presence of your hand.

“That’s not fair.” Bryony cries. She hits the button again, but again nothing happens.

“Hang on. You’ll get your turn in a minute. This card is for me, after all.” The card has a blue background framed in a red border. In the top corner is a symbol which you assume is meaningful in Japanese, with writing in English alongside it stating the category – ‘Nice’. Below this there is more writing in Japanese, again with the English translation. It says:

Yes, you realize your dad has definitely picked up Trudy's intellect and scientific focus. But he's jumping way ahead of what you were thinking. "Um, I just reckoned it wouldn't like us stopping halfway through."

"Hmm. You might be right. Wonder if there's any way to break the program. This is too good an opportunity to lose." He then surveys his new body, and his clothes struggling to say in place. "Guess you don't have any of Trudy's clothes here that I could put on, do you?"

"No! What sort of relationship do you think we have? Best I could do would be some of my stuff I guess. It may at least cover you up a bit, if you're conscious of exposing yourself. Although if we're in a temporal displacement thingy like you suggested, then it's only me here."

"True enough, and I imagine you've seen Trudy topless, so this can go..." He pulls off the jacket and shirt that he had been wearing, exposing his, or technically Trudy's breasts, and leaving him in just his boxers and socks.

So you're now facing what seems to be Trudy's near naked body, but containing your dad, apparently now wanting to stay as a Trudy, or at least as a girl. 1112211221221333.content:
There's a shimmering in the air beside your dad, just like you saw before Rini appeared. You are growing more worried by the second, and that is compounded multiple times when you recognize the shape coalescing to be that of Trudy, who pretty much pops out of thin air. She's standing, and looks totally confused and shocked. “What the Hell?!!!” She exclaims.
Then she sees you and your dad. “How the Hell did I get here?”

“I'm not entirely sure.” you answer, “There are a lot of strange things are happening right now that we can't quite explain...”

Trudy is wearing her netball kit, and you remember that she plays every Saturday in the school league. So you wonder exactly where she was until a few seconds ago, and guess that somehow she's been teleported here from there... you just hope she wasn't playing at the time. That would cause havoc if she just disappeared in the middle of the game, and particularly if she was in view.

“So what are you doing? I can't see why that could cause me to physically relocate, but guess something caused it. Guess some form of physical slipstream between locations that I fell into, but an odd pairing of locations.”

“My dad said he likes you better than me. That seems to have been the trigger.”

“Pretty unlikely. Where is your dad then?”

“You're standing next to him.”

“No, that's not your dad... That's not.... oh, hello. Who are you?” She immediately seems to blush, and her eyes lock onto your dad's face.

“I'm Garry,” your dad replies. “Why don't you sit down for a minute. You must be a bit in shock.”

As if waiting for the invitation, Trudy sits down immediately beside your dad, with her gaze still locked on him. “So, you must be Terry's brother or something then. I can see why he didn't tell me about you. I knew he was keeping something secret from me, I just didn't realize it would be someone as nice as you.” She grabs hold of his hand and squeezes it, then snuggles herself up against him. “So what are you playing Garry, and how the heck could it have created a displacement portal?”

As you watch, your girlfriend has gone from total shock at her teleportation to being totally entranced by your dad in about 5 seconds flat, and now seems to be ignoring you entirely as if you didn't exist. You have a strong feeling that whatever you may do or say will not have any affect on her sudden infatuation with your dad, and could probably make the whole situation worse, so you decide to keep quiet.

So, it looks like you've just lost you girlfriend to your dad – albeit the new younger version of your dad. You glance behind you, where the silicone body of Rini is still seated. Somehow you've lost Trudy and gained a sex doll. Not really a fair swap. You can only hope it doesn't get any worse than that.

Rather reluctantly you pick up the dice again. Whatever happens, you realize things will only get resolved once the game is over, so you may as well get on with it. You throw the dice, then move the game piece forwards. Where does it end up?

"So, what's up James?" ... "Ah, nothing's up. I just wanted to stop in and see what you were up to. I was bored today and wanted to see if you both wanted to do something.".

The wand speaks again.

"You must now wait for the other princess to take their turn. I will then return." And with that the wand vanishes from your grasp.

What will you do?
112111121221.title: "A body any Prince would die for..."

1121111212211.content:
You look around you, trying to take in your surroundings, but you're worried that if you wonder off, you may not be here when the wand returns. So you end up sitting on a boulder in the meadow. You look down at yourself. Hmm, your view is immediately hindered by your new breasts, which whilst you really don't have a clue to the sizing of such things, certainly seem huge. Beyond that your waist has shrunk, but you have pronounced hips. So, this is what a princess is 'supposed' to look like? you ponder to yourself.

The clothing that you have on seem to be past their best, and whilst not technically rags, the short black skirt has definite holes and tears, and is quite threadbare, revealing a lot of your legs - or rather your 'new' slimmer girl legs. The white top fits quite well now, filled out with your new boobs, although it too seems to have been quite well used. So, it this really what Cinderella wore as a scullery maid? You are slightly less sure about the gladiator sandals, which don't seem to fit the role, but at least everything is clean, and you have underwear, so apart from having changed gender, things could be worse. What are you talking about? Apart from changing gender? What could be worse than that?

After a couple more minutes, you hear a shimmering noise, and as you look up the wand reappears in front of you.

'Hello again Princess Cindy. It is now your turn to move. Please take me in your hand and wave me to determine your next move.'

You grab hold of the wand, and wave it in the air.

"Pretty Princess Cindy, you will move three locations forwards." As before, you instantly seem to take off into the air, and seconds later land again in a different part of the grounds, between a forest and a stream.

The wand then begins to change colors from red to green to gold. As you watch, the colors slow and finally stop on....
1121111212211.title: Wait for the wand to return

1121112.content:
The instructions merely say "Put on the costume and continue the game."

You look at the costume. It's blatantly obvious that this Princess Cindy is a carbon copy of Cinderella. It's a blue dress exactly like this:
http://kay-dee.net/costumes/cinderella/f...

"Good Lord" you exclaim.

The wand immediately appears.

"Please put the dress on."

"No"

"Fine"

The wand waves itself, and you are suspended in the air, and the dress is forcibly put onto you.

"Ughhh, this is going to suck."

You're then lowered back to the ground and almost trip in the glass heels you're now wearing.

"Now the game can proceed'.
1121112.title: a princess costume and some instructions

1123.content:
Picking through the pieces, you pull out a board. Unfolding it, the board looks like a 'Cludo' floor plan, but for a castle, and gardens. You shrug as you guess it makes sense for Princesses to live in a castle. Four locations are marked as starting positions. There's a selection of cards, and you ignore them for the moment.

The game looks like more of a rip-off than you first thought as you pop each of the Princesses on their starting squares. The rules, you ignore - you can read them once you've examined all the contents. Returning to the cards, you see they're broken into different categories. Curses, such as eternal sleep, and isolated, remind you of the various stories. Another selection of cards contain rescuers, and the final set of cards you can't quite work out their function.

It looks like you need to collect them to win, and escape to your happily ever after future.

Checking the box again, it looks empty. The dice spill out into your hands as you turn the box this way and that, and they fall onto the board. As they land and roll, they sound oddly heavy, almost ominous.

You've rolled six and a five. As you go to pick them up, wishing you'd actually been playing, you feel a disorienting sensation.

The room around you seems to fill with mist, until it's hidden in a dull fog. The outlines fade becoming greyer, and less distinct. Cautiously, taking a small step, you don't want to risk tripping and falling. But instead of your room, it's the coarse stone walls of a castle that come into view. But your attention is barely held by the unsettling location change, as you take in your new clothes... and the new body that fits those clothes so suitably.

- - - - -

You ignore Castle DunBroch, as a lock of curly, coppery hair falls across your face. The constriction of a tight corset adding to your humiliation.
https://78.media.tumblr.com/e0617d6bf572...


The towers of Agrabah rise around you, intimidating and alien. Gasping, you feel the shifting of a bust, and looking down to what felt like a canyon of cleavage.
https://78.media.tumblr.com/d0b231d2723f...


You can barely breathe, as the splendour erupts around you. Massive walls soaring towards the sky. However, a look south, and you take in your bust, that moves with every breath you take.
https://78.media.tumblr.com/4931cbbd3125...
1123.title: An accidental start.

choices: You run into Rajah, an ally.
The trip is trickier than you thought.
11232.content:
The Sun beats down relentlessly, and you start to sweat. Your hair feels heavy, thick and too long. The sight of your own cleavage curving away out of sight is unsettling. The angle unsettling, and as you watch a bead of sweat trickles downwards.

The crunching, crumpling of paper snatches your attention from your hypnotic bust, and it's rhythmic rise and fall of breathing.

Floating in front of you, a parchment hangs in the air, and unfurl.

'Reach the top of the tower to gather the first item. But watch out for the patrolling guards, and the sparkling clouds of Jafar's untamed magic'.

The scroll, rolls itself up, and vanishes in a puff of smoke. Your hand is outstretched to grab it, as it disappears. An unprincess-like snarl on your face. You doubt, meeting either the guards or the magic will kill you outright. But, it was frustratingly silent on the consequences of running into either of them.

Shielding your eyes from the Sun, you scan the palace skyline. There's a green glow around the top of one of the towers. It pulses slowly, until you get your bearings.

A tension hangs in the air, an electric crackling catches your attention. Across the garden from you, a ball of green and blue livid magic, shimmering between, flames, and ball lightning is heading in your direction.

Taking a deep breath, you head off in the opposite direction. The choice already made, you head inside. You start by running, but in only a few paces, you change to a steadier, smoother pace. Your jarring run, threatening to make the girls jump from the constraint of the halter top. Thankfully, you can move very quietly with your slippered feet making virtually no noise on the marble floor.

But in your haste, you almost walk into one of the guards. Instead, you duck behind one of the pillars, until he passes. Listening intently, you can no longer hear the ball of wild magic. You plan out your route to reach the tower.

You are aware of a garage sale nearby, so decide to walk over to pass some time, and see if there's anything of interest there. 122.content:
You brush off the dust and immediately recognize this as a Disney game, but a closer observation tells you otherwise. At first sight the logo looked like Disney's Mickey ears, but it is in reality just three black circles, and what you assumed was the Disney title actually reads as Dizney's Enchanted Princess Game. Looks like you've wasted your money on a flippin' forgery, and to boot you've picked up a friggin' kid's game. Oh well, it's not as if you can really take it back and demand a refund, so you take the lid off to see what's inside.

There's a playing board, with four playing pieces (cardboard cut outs of princesses on molded plastic bases), a cardboard castle to erect at one end of the board, and a chunky plastic magic wand. Well, to be honest it looks like the real thing, so assuming the wand works to tell you your moves, then it may be OK to play with your little sister (or just to give it to her to play with her little friends). You decide to check the battery, as doubtless it will have been removed or drained, but find that there's no obvious battery compartment. Instead you press the button on the side of the wand, and the head of the wand glows, at least signifying that there is charge.

OK, so you could play the game on your own (are you really that desperate?), try to find someone to play with, or just abandon the game completely and let your sister have it.

1222.content:
Almost as if planned your door opens and your younger sibling walks in. Trudy is 10 years old and generally a bundle of mischief, and frequently annoys the hell out of you. 'Hiya sis!' she says as she scans around looking for anything new or interesting that she can beg, steel or borrow, frequently for you never to see again. 'Oooh, what you got there then? You're not playing a game on your own are you?' That's not much fun. I'll let you play it with me.'

'Yeah, well, I wasn't really going to do much with it. I hadn't realized what it was when I got it. So I thought it may be a bit more appropriate for you to play with some of your friends anyway.'

'What? Disney's Princesses? Come off it Katy. I'm 10. Last time I played that I was around 6!'

'Yeah, I know. Bit of a bummer really.'

'Never mind. We can give it a go anyway. I know mom's banned you from just about everything else, so if you don't mind lowering your expectations a bit it may be a laugh.'

Well, perhaps she's right. If you don't play the game, then you'll have nothing else to do (apart from possibly your household chores or homework, but they don't really count as priority activities for a weekend), so you semi-reluctantly agree.

"So what happens first?" you ask her, as Trudy clearly has a better idea about it than you.

"Oh, that's easy. You pick one of the princesses as your playing piece, and then the younger player starts by waving the wand. I think I'll be Sleeping Beauty." She picks up one of the cardboard figures and looks a little more closely at it. "Oh, apparently not Sleeping Beauty."

"Eh, what do you mean?" you ask.

"Well, the picture's definitely wrong - Sleeping Beauty never wore a mini skirt and thigh length boots, and besides it has a name at the bottom - Bouncing Beauties. I think she's a bit top heavy too."

You have a closer look, and indeed this is not the Sleeping Beauty you remember, but a somewhat raunchier version! OK, so Trudy has taken Bouncing Beauties as her playing piece. What will you choose?

Hmm, interesting.

You place your Twinky Belle playing character next to Trudy's Bouncing Beauties at the end of the board closest to you ' at the gateway into the castle grounds as depicted on the board. Trudy picks up the wand and waves it in the air to start the game, expecting the first (potentially randomly generated) instruction to be announced from the little speaker on the wand's shaft. The top of the wand starts glowing again, but this time it also seems to be emitting sparks into the air. Suddenly Trudy yelps 'Ow! That's hot!' and lets go of the wand.

However, instead of falling to the floor the wand seems to hover in the air, still emitting multi-colored sparks. You're not sure whether to be worried or impressed. Then you hear a voice. It starts quite tinny, as you'd expect from the little speaker, but somehow seems to expand in depth and breadth until after a few words it seems to fill the air all around you.

'Welcome princesses! It's time to take your places in the enchanted lands, and battle the hidden challenges and obstacles to reach the castle drawbridge first. Let the game begin!' You glance across at Trudy, and she's similarly looking at you, both a bit disconcerted by what has just happened. Then...

Simultaneously your tee shirt seems to be changing color to a lime green, and also growing shorter! Your jeans have now become shorts, and are still getting shorter, and as you watch they also turn lime green, and finally form into a micro skirt. You realize that they're turning into matching fishnets, and as they reach your thighs they form into garter buckles, which then reach on under the bottom of your new little skirt, no doubt connecting to a garter belt that you didn't have before.

You then realize that whilst watching what was happening to your bottom half, you had failed to notice that your tee had virtually disappeared entirely, now being a sheer mesh, almost transparent but for the lime green hue, bunched on each of your upper arms, and barely reaching under your breasts, leaving your tummy uncovered down to the top of your micro skirt. Your bra is now a metallic green micro bra with transparent straps, with enough shiny material to cover your nipples but not much more, all clearly visible through the mesh top.

12431.title: Open

13.content:
Your name is Brian. You are a 14-year-old boy who has recently been forbidden from any sort of screen time by your mother after she caught you pulling yet another all nighter skyping with your friends.


"Man, this blows," you mutter to yourself, unconciously pushing some of your brown hair out of your eyes. Now you had to find something to preoccupy yourself for the day. "God, what is there to do in this stupid house," you brood.


"Well for one, you could look downstairs for some old board games or something that the previous owners left." You turned to see your mom standing with a full laundry basket balanced on her, admittedly, generous hips in your doorway. "I just do not want to see your face glued to another screen today, mister. Maybe you could even clean the area up down there. God knows it could use it."


Your mom was right, the basement was a mess. You'd been living in your house for years, but no one had ever really tried to go through the piles of dusty boxes down there. In fact, it was one of the chores you still hadn't done that had pushed your mom to enact the screen ban for the week in the first place.


As your mom turns to go sort the laundry in her room, you sigh and decide to take her advice. After heading down the first flight of stairs, you fumble for the switch in the darkness at the top of the basement steps. With a *click*, the suprisingly large basement suddenly glows under the pale light of a string of incandescent bulbs. Each piece of junk scattered across the floor and shelves casts a shadow creating a rather ominous atmosphere. Being careful not to the trip on the rickety bottom step, you begin to walk towards the back where the pile of old boxes left by the previous owner is located. As you force your way past the junk, avoiding snagging your t-shirt on old furniture pieces and coathangers, it becomes more and more apparent how long it's been since someone has been back here. The cobwebs and layers of dust are abundant and thick when you reach the yellowed cardboard.


Coughing, you begin to scan the labels on the various boxes written in a spidery hand. Towards the top of the pile, you spot your prize. Games. Tentatively placing your sneaker on a box labeled Books, you probe its strength and use it to boost yourself up to reach the game one. Securing your game box prize, you are surprised by its weight and quickly place it down on the concrete floor of the basement. Opening its folds, you peer inside.


The box is certainly full of board games, and something about the prospect of playing a really old game actually is starting to sound rather exciting. You eagerly pull out a few games so that you can better see what you're dealing with. Curiosity leads to confusion when you realize you don't recognize a single one. Tearing through the box, you realize that there are no Monopolies, Snakes n Ladders, or even an Othello in this box. Not even a Parcheesi. Instead, you find there are five games you've never heard of before.


The first box is rectangular with cartoonish drawings of buff surfer dudes and buxom, bikini-clad ladies. The title is splayed across the front in big, red letters: BEACH BOD - Compete with members for their best traits come swimsuit season! Winner takes all! You can't really make out how to play the game. The gyst you get from looking at the back of the box is that players take turns going around the board with a chance to draw a wacky random trait card or something.


Setting that one aside, you pick up the next box. This one is much smaller. The blocky lettering spelling its title reads, TRUTH OR DARE... OR CHANGE. The box promises an ironic punishment for liars and take-backers.


The third box was large and pink and looked like one of those romantic couple-y games, which you sorta ignored in favor of looking at the one below it.


This box was more what you would expect from a spooky basement. The title, written in red gossamer handwriting, was OUIJA - See things from the other side!


Placing the Ouija boardgame to the side, you look at the final box. This one was too old and faded to really make out what it's contents were. As you try to make heads or tails of what its contents might be, you suddenly feel a strange tickling sensation on your right hand. Nonchalantly glancing down, you see what can only be described as the largest spider you have ever seen in your life, slowly walking toward your forearm. Freaking out and swinging your hand frantically, you desperately stand-up, grabbing one of the games as you do so.


Dodging through the old junk twice as fast as it took you to get through it before, you sprinted up the basement stairs with your selection clutched closely to your chest. You flick the lights off, and slam the door shut behind you, eliciting a brief scolding from your mom from upstairs. Gaining your breath back, you calm down enough to look down at which game you brought with you. Which one did you select?
13.title: Boy, early teens

choices: Your mother; here to bring you some healthy snacks.
Your 18-year-old sister, whom your mother sent in to keep an eye on you two.
131.content:
"Beach bod, huh," you mutter to yourself, "Wonder if this will be any good?"


Before you can open the box, however, you hear a familiar ringtone go off. Instinctively you reach for your pocket, but then remember that your mom has confiscated your phone, and instead, the sound is coming from upstairs.


"Brian, dear!" your mom calls down, "It's David! You can talk to him briefly, but I want the phone back as soon as you're done!"


"Coming!" You sprint up the stairs and grab the smartphone from your mother's manicured fingers. "Hey, Dave. How you doing?"


"Eh, could be better," comes the sound from your friend on the phone, "I know this is kinda presumptuous, but I was really hoping I could chill at your place today? My sister has her friends over, and they're driving me insane."


"Yeah sure, man. But..." you sneak a quick glance at your mother who is waiting, arms crossed, at the top of the stairs for you to finish, "I don't think we'll be able to do any videogames or anything like that. Mom's rules."


"S'alright, dude," David says, "I'm game for whatever. Just gotta get out of the house."


"Alright, sweet. See you soon, Dave!"


"Yep, see you in five, Bri Guy!"


Five minutes later, there is a knock on your door. Springing up, you open the door to your gangly friend smiling goofily at you. For everything he lacked in width, your friend more than made up for in height. At age 14, he was already 6 feet tall, more than a little higher than your 5'6" stature. As he steps into the entryway, David embraces you in a contricting hug. Being a beanpole, Dave's hugs were more of a nusance than anything else, and you retaliate with a hug that makes his back pop. Those basketball muscles were coming in handy.


"How you been bud?" Dave grins. Dave's half-smile along with his piercing blue eyes were always enough to drive the girls in your grade wild, but he was always way too insecure to realize. Something was off about his charm though today.


"Pretty well. You got a haircut," you say, pointing at Dave's head.


"Yea," he responds, running his hand through his dirty-blonde, now buzz-cutted hair, "My mom said it was getting too long."


"Yea, I feel you," you respond, briefly flicking a bit of your dark brown hair out of your equally brown eyes, "Anyways, did you have anything you wanted to do today? I found something that might interest you."


"Didn't have anything in mind. Whatcha got?" Dave responds, following you into the livingroom.


You had already taken the game out of its box while waiting for David to arrive, and the game board sat on the glass coffee table.


"Woah, what kind of game is that?" Dave says with a hint of awe in his voice, "It looks vintage."


"No clue. You arrived right when I was about to read the rules."


"'Beach Bod', huh? Sounds interesting. Alright, read the rules aloud."


You grab the top of the box which contains 6 game pieces, a card dispenser, and a 6-sided die. Below the pieces which you scoop to the side, is a small rulebook. You clear your throat.


"Welcome to Beach Bod! The game that giveth, and the game that taketh away! Do you have what it takes to get your ideal beach bod?"
